description: I have been using Bitcoin as my primary currency for the net for about 2 or 3 years by now and i just love it. When i discovered Electrum i found a BS-free client that just gave me what i needed; a way to send and recieve with no stupid buttons or exchanges. I would recommend it to everyone who is into Bitcoin
summary: Best Lightweight Bitcoin Wallet for Linux

description:
It's working.
After almost 6 years of inactivity i managed to launch it and successfully restored my wallet
